title: Red wine pot roast
ingredients: ['1.4kg boneless topside roasting joint', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '125ml water', '125ml red wine', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon dried marjoram', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 onion, sliced', '6 potatoes, washed and halved', '6 carrot, peeled and cut into 2-inch lengths', '8 shallots, peeled and halved']
